snippet: Ford added touch-screen controls ahead of its competitors, but the flaws hurt its reputation and its rating from Consumer Reports.
abstract: Ford Motor Co began adding touch-screen controls in 2010 ahead of its competitors, but the flaws hurt its reputation and its rating from Consumer Reports; firm has issued a major upgrade that redesigns much of what customers see on the screen and tries to resolve complaints about the system crashing or rebooting while the vehicle is being driven.
lead_paragraph: Ford added touch-screen controls ahead of its competitors, but the flaws hurt its reputation and its rating from Consumer Reports.

headline.seo: After Ratings Drop, Ford Reworks Touch Screens
